content.question: Hokusai’s inclusion of Mount Fuji in this print series may have been intended to

choices.label: raise awareness of emerging environmental issues, such as increasing deforestation
attract the interest of Japanese tourists, since the mountain was a popular travel destination
win favor among Buddhist monks, who desired more pilgrims at Fuji monasteries
please government officials, who encouraged foreign tourists to visit sites such as Fuji

content.answer: attract the interest of Japanese tourists, since the mountain was a popular travel destination
